column4: I'm back... and... the cd is right... I think it's some trouble with the distro (ubuntu 8.4.1 64 bits)
for exemple - at the documentation of help, it tell me to go system>Preferencies>Hardware info - I dont have this Hardware something option :(
the path is - System>Preferencies>hardware something (I can't quite remember) but there's nothing even close to it :(
